title: contained in any Act or any instrument made under such Act and relating to any
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Dog Control (Transfer of Departmental
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Dog Control (Transfer of Departmental 

Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2025. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 1 June 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited dog control (transfer departmental administration ministerial functions) order 2025 (2) order come operation 1 june 2025

title: contained in any Act or any instrument made under such Act and relating to any
heading: 2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise,
text_raw:
2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise, 
performance or execution of any functions transferred by Article 3 are 
transferred to the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

(2) References to the Department of Rural and Community Development 
contained in any Act or any instrument made under such Act and relating to any 
administration and business transferred by paragraph (1) shall, from the 
commencement of this Order, be construed as references to the Department of 
Agriculture, Food and the Marine.
text_norm: 2 (1) administration business connection exercise performance execution function transferred article 3 transferred department agriculture food marine (2) reference department rural community development contained act instrument made act relating administration business transferred paragraph (1) shall commencement order construed reference department agriculture food marine

title: contained in any Act or any instrument made under such Act and relating to any
heading: 3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Rural and Community
text_raw:
3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Rural and Community 
Development by or under the Acts specified in the Schedule are transferred to 
the Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

(2) References to the Minister for Rural and Community Development 
contained in any Act or instrument made under such Act and relating to any 
functions transferred by this Article shall, from the commencement of this Order, 
be construed as references to the Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine.
text_norm: 3 (1) function vested minister rural community development act specified schedule transferred minister agriculture food marine (2) reference minister rural community development contained act instrument made act relating function transferred article shall commencement order construed reference minister agriculture food marine

title: contained in any Act or any instrument made under such Act and relating to any
heading: 4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal
text_raw:
4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal 
proceedings are pending to which the Minister for Rural and Community 
Development is a party and the proceedings have reference to functions 
transferred by this Order to the Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine, 
the name of the Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine, shall, in so far as 
the proceedings relate to any function transferred by this Order, be substituted in 
the proceedings for that of the Minister for Rural and Community Development 
or added in the proceedings, as may be appropriate, and the proceedings shall 
not abate by reason of such substitution.
text_norm: 4 immediately commencement order legal proceeding pending minister rural community development party proceeding reference function transferred order minister agriculture food marine name minister agriculture food marine shall far proceeding relate function transferred order substituted proceeding minister rural community development added proceeding may appropriate proceeding shall abate reason substitution

title: contained in any Act or any instrument made under such Act and relating to any
heading: 5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or
text_raw:
5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or 
under the authority of the Minister for Rural and Community Development may, 
in so far as it relates to functions transferred by this Order to the Minister for 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 3rd June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [238] 3 

Agriculture, Food and the Marine, be carried on or completed on or after such 
commencement by the Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine.

title: contained in any Act or any instrument made under such Act and relating to any
heading: 6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in
text_raw:
6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in 
the performance of a function transferred by this Order shall, if and in so far as 
it was operative immediately before the commencement of this Order, have 
effect from such commencement as if it had been granted or made by the 
Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine.
text_norm: 6 every document (including certificate licence) granted made performance function transferred order shall far operative immediately commencement order effect commencement granted made minister agriculture food marine

title: contained in any Act or any instrument made under such Act and relating to any
heading: 7. References to the Minister for Rural and Community Development
text_raw:
7. References to the Minister for Rural and Community Development 
contained in the memorandum and articles of association of any company and 
relating to any function transferred by this Order shall, from the commencement 
of this Order, be construed as references to the Minister for Agriculture, Food 
and the Marine.
text_norm: 7 reference minister rural community development contained memorandum article association company relating function transferred order shall commencement order construed reference minister agriculture food marine

title: contained in any Act or any instrument made under such Act and relating to any
heading: 8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the
text_raw:
8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the 
commencement of this Order by the Minister for Rural and Community 
Development in connection with the functions transferred by this Order are 
transferred to the Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine and, 
accordingly, without any further conveyance, transfer or assignment, on such 
commencement – 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

that property, both real and personal, vests in the Minister for 
Agriculture, Food and the Marine, 

those rights shall be enjoyed by the Minister for Agriculture, Food 
and the Marine, and 

those liabilities are liabilities of the Minister for Agriculture, 
Food and the Marine. 

(2) All monies, stocks, shares and securities transferred to the Minister 
Agriculture, Food and the Marine by this Article which, on the commencement 
of this Order, are standing in the name of the Minister for Rural and Community 
Development shall on the request of the Minister for Agriculture, Food and the 
Marine be transferred into the name of the Minister for Agriculture, Food and 
the Marine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [238]
